short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stops you from copy pasting answers from stackoverflow. It turns out that actually understanding the code is a lot better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stops you from copy pasting answers from stackoverflow. It turns out that actually writing the code yourself and not copying it from random people on the internet will give you better understanding and code quality (shocking).

You can still overcome this block in multiple ways but at least you will feel bad while doing it as you should.
